Headline: 3rdEngr/2nd Asst Engr| Founder @ NANDIX | Marine Engineer | Building Indiaâ€™s First Autonomous Retail Intelligence Engine | Making Retail Self-Driving Engineer | Adaptive Problem Solver
Comment:
Amazing journey and an even more impressive category creation. One thought that may unlock a new revenue stream...

In Tier-2 and Tier-3 India, a large percentage of households donâ€™t use standard bed sizes they either buy custom cots or get them made by local carpenters. This often creates a psychological friction for premium mattress buyers because they feel 'standard' mattresses may not perfectly fit.

If The Sleep Company introduced a "Custom fit Program" ..where a visit / measurement support / or a â‚¹xxx voucher for local cot resizing is bundled with the mattress purchase it eliminates this barrier completely. 

Mattress purchase would move from product choice to #homefitsolution. That single shift can increase conversion rates dramatically, especially in markets where disposable income is growing but customization mindset is high.....

Just a thought that might accelerate penetration beyond the metros. hope this adds value.....
